description: The Warhammer 40,000 universe is vast, spanning hundreds of books, video games, and--of course--the tabletop wargame. It can be intimidating to get into, but the upcoming Warhammer 40,000: The Ultimate Guide hardcover book launching October 29 is looking like one of the best introductions to this massive fictional setting. Preorders are available at Amazon, and you can grab it right now for a slight discount at $40.50 (normally $45).
title: Warhammer 40,000's First Encyclopedia Looks Like The Perfect Entry Point For New Fans

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6's Liberty Falls might be a smaller Zombies map, but it still contains some secrets to explore. One Easter egg includes gaining access to a locked vault, which contains free randomized loot items. Here is everything you need to know to find, unlock, and use the loot vault in Liberty Falls.

How to find the loot vault
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Zombies - How To Unlock The Loot Vault On Liberty Falls

description:
Destiny 2's next seasonal celebration, the Halloween-themed Festival of the Lost, will offer new ways to get some highly sought-after rewards. The annual event is bringing a means to get its best piece of armor, the ability-combining Exotic class item, that allows you to skip the (excellent, but potentially arduous) two-player Dual Destiny mission. The Festival of the Lost will also see the return of Superblack, an all-black cosmetic shader players haven't been able to get in the game since the launch of the Final Shape expansion.

Bungie laid out the details for how to get both rewa
title: Destiny 2's Festival Of The Lost Offers Superblack Shader And A New Way To Get Exotic Class Items

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 brings the return of Treyarch's traditional, round-base Zombies. The best map for getting started, especially for beginners, is the Liberty Falls map. Here we'll explain how to gain access to the Pack-a-Punch machine, as well as the costs associated with those upgrades for your weapons.

How to find and unlock the Liberty Falls Pack-a-Punch

When starting a match on Liberty Falls, the Pack-a-Punch machine will be on the opposite end of the gas station rooftop where you'll spawn. This will take some time to earn enough points to access the area you need to go.

There's also more than one path you can take, with doors to unlock on the left and right side of your starting area, but we recommend choosing the right side. This will give you quicker access to the most essential perks of Juggernog and Quick Revive.
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Zombies - How To Unlock And Use Pack-a-Punch On Liberty Falls

description:
Horror fans know that October is typically filled with absolutely ghoulish delights. This year, one of the best scares comes care of Blumhouse and Peacock.

This past week, I attended Blumhouse and Peacock's Overnightmare at the Stanley Hotel in Estes Park, Colorado. While I had previously heard of the Stanley, which is the spooky hotel that inspired Stephen King's The Shining (and is haunted) (I cannot stress enough that this hotel is haunted for real), I had no idea what could be in store for me in what was billed as an "immersive overnight experience" based on the films of Blumhouse.
title: Blumhouse And Peacock's Immersive Horror Hotel Needs To Be A Halloween Staple

description:
Earlier this year, 20th Century Studios announced that Predator: Badlands will mark the franchise's return to the big screen for the first time since 2018's The Predator. But apparently the studio has much bigger plans for the franchise than anyone believed, and that includes a previously unannounced secret Predator movie.

20th Century Studios President Steve Asbell dropped the news during an interview with The Hollywood Reporter. He also confirmed that Prey director Dan Trachenberg is directing both of the upcoming Predator films.

"After Prey became a success, Dan [Trachtenberg] came back and said he didn't want to do Prey 2," recalled Asbell. "And we're like, 'What do you want to do?' And he rattled off a bunch of ideas that were real
title: There Are Two Predator Movies Coming In 2025, Somehow Both Directed By Prey's Dan Trachtenberg

description:
Destiny 2's annual Festival of the Lost event returns for 2024 soon, and while overall it sounds a lot like what we've seen in the past, there are several noticeable wrinkles and new rewards. Arguably the most notable of these is a new opportunity to earn the Superblack shader, a beloved option from the first game that was briefly available earlier this year as part of the Into the Light update. Starting on October 29, you'll be able to get it again--here's how.

Bungie has revealed that Superblack will be available by completing the Ghost Writer event challenge during Festival of the Lost 2024. This challenge includes completing 15 event challenges--basically, you'll need to grind your way through the entire event, which is something you may have done anyway. We don't yet know what those challenges are, but we'll report back once Festival of the Lost launches on October 29 with what you need to do and any tips on how to expedite the proce
title: How To Unlock The Superblack Shader In Destiny 2 (Again)

description:
Netflix's recently released docuseries, Mr. McMahon, offered non-wrestling fans a revealing look at the embattled former owner of WWE, Vincent K. McMahon. That miniseries touched upon a WWE ring boys scandal from the 1980s, which has now led to a new lawsuit against McMahon, his wife and former WWE CEO Linda McMahon, as well as World Wrestling Entertainment.

As reported by NBC, five former WWE ring boys--the industry term for teens who helped put the ring together at shows--have filed a case alleging that McMahon and WWE failed to protect them from being sexually sexually exploited by former ring announcer Melvin Phillips Jr., who died in 2012. At the time of the alleged crimes, the victims were all underage, w
title: Lawsuit Accuses Ex-WWE Owner Vince McMahon Of Disturbing New Allegations

description:
If you’re a PC player looking to take your experience to the next level, it’s time to talk about PC Game Pass.

For just $13.95 a month, your PC Game Pass subscription opens the door to a massive library of high-quality games — including major day-one releases like Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, and Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, as well as exclusive perks you won’t want to miss.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 needs no introduction, promising to deliver the intense gameplay and engaging narratives fans expect from this blockbuster franchise, making it a must-play for FPS enthusiasts.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Level Up Your Gaming Life With One Move You Won’t Regret

description:
Earlier this year, author Neil Gaiman was accused of sexual misconduct by multiple women, which imperiled the renewal of his Prime Video series, Good Omens. The show had already been renewed for Season 3, and Gaiman offered to step aside in order to allow it to continue. Now, the fate of the series has been determined, and Good Omens' final season has been condensed to a single episode.

According to The Hollywood Reporter, the series finale of Good Omens will be a 90 minute feature-length episode. The report also states that Gaiman will not be involved in the production of the show's final episode, although he is said to have contributed to the script. The final e
title: Just One Episode Will Make Up The Final Season Of Good Omens Amid Neil Gaiman Allegations

description:
Silent Hill 2 Remake faithfully includes a huge amount of material from the 2001 original, from dialogue to notes you can find scattered throughout the game, and also adds a whole lot of interesting additions. Some of those additions seem to suggest that the remake is more than a remake, and is actually something of a sequel to Silent Hill 2. Others appear to expand on the original story and provide additional elements of symbolism and strangeness informing what's happening to protagonist James Sunderland.

While GameSpot's Kurt Indovina already documented a lot of the major changes between the original Silent Hill 2 and Bloober Team's remake, there are a lot of other interesting little Easter eggs and suggestive tidbits scattered th
title: Silent Hill 2 Remake Secrets: 20 Easter Eggs You May Have Missed

description:
Indie developer Night Dial has just released its latest horror game, titled "Crowded. Followed." The game sees players step into the shoes of an unnamed protagonist who stumbles across a disturbed, dying man in the middle of what seems to be a massive street party. The man urges the player to take a (rather diseased-looking) briefcase from him, warning them that the briefcase will cause them to be followed by an unknown entity.

From the looks of the trailer, the game's plot appears quite similar to that of 2014's It Follows, a horror film about a woman who is haunted by a cursed, evil force that follows her through life, often taking on the appearance of other people.
title: New Analog Horror Game Is Basically It Follows, Out Now With A Demo

description:
Today, October 24, marks the 10th anniversary of John Wick, the film that revitalized Keanu Reeves' career and arguably ranks among the greatest action movies of all time. But few knew how close the project came to never happening, if not for the intervention of actress-turned-filmmaker Eva Longoria.

While speaking with Business Insider, John Wick director Chad Stahelski explained how Longoria saved the film from collapsing when funding for the project was in jeopardy before the start of production.

"We were less than a week out, and we lost almost $6 million on a gap financing." recalled Stahelski. "We were financing independently to get the bond, but one of the investors couldn’t raise the money in time. [Longoria] came to the rescue, and she provided the gap fina
title: The Original John Wick Was Saved By A Surprising Producer

description: With Halloween just a week away, Amazon is slashing prices on a wide assortment of horror movies and TV shows on Blu-ray. From box sets of classic franchises like Friday the 13th and Halloween to collections of modern hits like Saw and The Ring, there's no shortage of budget-friendly horror on offer at Amazon right now. We've rounded up our favorite horror movie and TV series
title: Best Horror Movie 4K Box Sets And Steelbook Deals At Amazon Ahead Of Halloween

description:
Ahead of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6's official launch on October 25, Activision reveals more accessibility features added to the game. This includes HUD presets, customizable high-contrast settings, an arachnophobia setting for Zombies, and more.

Activision says it wants to make it easier for more players to jump into the game, so innovative accessibility options for Call of Duty has "always been a priority." The publisher also reveals that the accessibility settings menu is accessed by nearly half of all players.
title: CoD: Black Ops 6 Adds New Accessibility Options, Including Arachnophobia Setting For Zombies

description:
Sony has unveiled a new limited-edition Monster Hunter Wilds-themed PS5 controller and console cover ahead of the game's February 28 launch. But there's a catch: These eye-catching accessories appear to be exclusive to Japan.

Revealed via a blog post on PlayStation Japan's website, "limited quantities" of the themed controller and faceplate are scheduled to go on sale the same day the game launches. The items are sold separately, and will become available to preorder starting on October 30.
title: Snazzy Monster Hunter Wilds PS5 Controller And Faceplate Revealed, With A Catch

description:
A new patch has gone live for Star Wars Outlaws, and the key takeaway from this update is that stealth missions should be less frustrating to play. Developer Massive Entertainment says that it has focused on improving stealth to give players more flexibility, and another welcome fix being introduced in the update is an improvement to speeder travel.

Stealth in Outlaws was fairly unforgiving when the game first launched, although this has been fine-tuned over the last couple of weeks. The new tweaks aim to reduce the frequency of instant-fail moments during specific missions, allowing players to have more options at their disposal to complete these sequences.

For speeder travel, the developer says it is "reducing collisions" with objects in the environment through this patch. A notorious bug in Outlaws, speeder travel could often result in Kay Vess experiencing low-orbit travel when she was flung from her v
title: Star Wars Outlaws Update Aims To Make Stealth Missions Less Frustrating

description:
With the Halloween launch of Dragon Age: The Veilguard just days away, developer BioWare has released a launch trailer to give players one final preview of the franchise's latest entry.

Previous trailers for The Veilguard have focused mostly on introducing players to Tevinter (where the game is set) and the companions who will be accompanying them there. The new launch trailer, however, revolves mostly around the enemies players will be facing as they battle to save Thedas.

"Artifacts that have been dormant for centuries are awakening," a voiceover explains as a metallic monster somewhat resembling
title: New Dragon Age: The Veilguard Launch Trailer Gives Players A Good Look At The Bad Guys

description: Alexander Kriss is a clinical psychologist and author based in New York, and has written extensively about why we play games, and the effect games can have on their players. He's also a lifelong fan of the original Silent Hill 2, and has written about the game and its characters from the perspective of a psychologist. Today he's breaking down some of the characters and themes from Silent Hill 2, and seeing how the 2024 remake stacks up against the 2001 original.
title: Psychologist Reacts to Silent Hill 2's Characters and Themes

description:
Google has outdone itself with its latest playable Google Doodle, unveiling a card game that will return every month with new features to unlock. The Doodle is called Rise of the Half Moon, and coincides with October's half-moon phase, while future iterations will presumably return for half-moon phases in other months.

The game has players squaring off against the Half Moon in a card-matching game, with multiple ways to build up points. Score one point for matching a moon phase with the same moon phase, or two points for matching it with its opposite to create a full moon. However the most points can be racked up by creating lunar cycles of three cards or more--but your opponent can snatch your points off you by adding more cards to a cycle.

If you win three games against the Half Moon, you can unlock a special power-up, with four available to be collected in the 24 hours this Doodle is available each month. Google has added some extra information about the Doodle on i
title: Google Doodles Launches Monthly Recurring Card Game Based On Moon Cycles

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 launches worldwide on October 25, so Treyarch has released the patch notes to reveal all the changes made after the game's beta. This includes weapon changes and small adjustments to several multiplayer map designs for Black Ops 6.

Black Ops 6 includes campaign, multiplayer, and Zombies, and while some players are getting hands-on time early thanks to New Zealand's time zone, the game doesn't officially arrive until tomorrow. Treyarch has revealed that all side Easter eggs and main story quests for both Zombies maps will remain locked until 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET / 6 PM BST on October 25 to avoid any major spoilers and give all players a fair opportunity to discover them.
title: CoD: Black Ops 6 - Launch-Day Patch Notes Detail Weapon Changes And Scud Map Improvement

description:
There are only a handful of months left to play Minecraft in VR. That's because developer Mojang is ditching support for VR and mixed-reality headsets in March 2025.

Mojang detailed this major shift in VR support as part of a Minecraft: Bedrock Edition changelog published this week. "Our ability to support VR/MR devices has come to an end and will no longer be supported in updates after March of 2025, when you will receive your final update," the notes read. It's also confirmed that "you will no longer be able to use your VR/MR device with Minecraft" after this update, though any purchases and worlds will continue to work on say a regular PC.
title: Minecraft Will Stop Supporting VR Headsets Early Next Year

description:
At only seven years old, Sony's Horizon Zero Dawn didn't seem like an obvious choice to get a new remastered edition. Regardless, Horizon Zero Dawn Remaster is only a week away, and a trio of players have taken it upon themselves to create a detailed comparison between the original version and its new upgrade.

Reddit users Lanny16_I_think, Nixxes, and Guerrilla compiled the comparison and painstakingly used an early copy of Zero Dawn Remaster to match up with shots from the game's first incarnation. In each instance, the remaster added noticeable improvements beyond the graphics that made the world of Aloy seem more alive and real than before. Check it out in the i
title: Horizon Zero Dawn Remaster Comparison Shows Big Visual Upgrades

description:
Ubisoft has started development on a new Rayman game, and series creator Michel Ancel is working on the project as a consultant. The company's Milan and Montpellier studios are in the "exploration phase" for the title.

Eurogamer received confirmation about a new Rayman game from Ubisoft, after Insider Gaming reported a remake was in the works for the franchise. "We are pleased to confirm Ubisoft Montpellier and Ubisoft Milan have recently started an exploration phase on the Rayman brand," a Ubisoft spokesperson said. "The project is still in its early stages, and we will share more details later. As creator of the Rayman brand, Michel Ancel is being consulted to ensure consistency within the universe."

Ancel is the original
title: A New Rayman Is In Development, With Creator Michel Ancel Consulting
